Name: Skitt
About the game: The story of the leader of a shelter who will have to make difficult decisions to protect his people from a parasite that turns humans into monsters. The enemy can take various forms The parasite can transform into all kinds of aberrations in order to survive. Eliminating such an enemy will not be an easy thing... Choose the character that fits the situation There are four different classes: Damage, Agile, Heavy, and Healer. Each class has two characters with abilities and weapons that make them unique. Choose the class and character depending on the situation. Use the advantage that suits your way of playing After choosing the character you can choose an advantage that can change from their weapons to their abilities and thus, adapt to your style of play. Upgrade your base to unlock new game mechanics You can upgrade three areas of your shelter: social, training and research areas. By improving them you get improvements in the gameplay such as advantages or objects that you can use in missions such as a Molotov cocktail or a bait to distract the enemies. Make decisions that affect the game systems In history there will be critical moments in which you will have to make decisions that affect the game systems in a negative or positive way. These decisions stack so the effects will be greater the more you progress in the story.
Meta Title: Skitt: Aug 24, 2020, Ricardo Huerta and Full Overview
